edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared
Interface NodeStructure

All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeStructureImpl, PamNodeStructure
public interface NodeStructure

A NodeStructure holds a collection of Nodes an Links. An implementation of this interface could be used as the "Common Currency" between the Modules of LIDA

Author:
Javier Snaider
